Text:
Just to get this straight. 

Is Tiesto the so called "Allure"???

yes tiesto is allure.

thanks for the upload

I have the impression that Tiesto "helped" this project with Allure - since that it is his nickname. Though he wasn't the one who "made" the tracks in the album. he simply helped them produce the album - Am I far-off here, or is it correct? Would be appreciated if someone could explain all of this!
Tiesto is Allure its an alias of his, like Markus Schulz uses Dakota as an alias.
